channel.description: Recent content in Software on Valticus

item.title: Plans For The Nearest Future Of This Blog
item.description: Quick post on my plans for this blog. Basically, I am planning to recommend you, the reader, what I use myself - be it a computer keyboard I use, a book I’ve read or a coffee brand I like. What will be covered (the list is subject to change with time): Programming Coding Books Hardware Software Merchandise Hope you will find my recommendations useful, or at the very least - entertaining.
